Technology consists of engineering teams. It is aimed to create and deliver our products focusing on People Programs, ensure they work as designed to bring value to EPAM, and make products delivery ‘green’ and ‘lean’.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cross-portfolio teams\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Along with delivery teams, there are several cross-portfolio teams. team is managed by the Delivery Core team with the support of other contributors from the People Technology Portfolio members. You can see all common working processes, best practices, and approaches in the delivery management, which the team is monitoring and working on, at the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1679567353\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"BSS Delivery Management WMS&PT KB page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the moment, we have several introduced general processes and approaches\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data-driven delivery\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are following data-driven approaches in terms of status reporting and client alignment. Therefore, metrics are our basis for providing status to the main stakeholders (client/senior management and the team). Our goal is to provide objective and accurate information and to leave out subjective opinions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWMSDM/5.2+Delivery+Metrics\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Metrics\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Weekly Status Report\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All delivery managers know that clients are always primarily interested in the situation on a project, whether the team is moving in the right direction, whether set objectives are being followed or whether the budget and deadlines are being respected correctly. It is essential to convey to business customers a complete picture of the situation on the project to understand unambiguously how successful the project is.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On all projects, there are roles of an account manager and a delivery supervisor, whose responsibilities include tracking a level of customer satisfaction and the quality of project execution and helping delivery managers if these indicators deviate from the specified values.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWMSDM/.1+Project+Weekly+Status+Report+-+Guide\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Weekly Status Report - Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DevOps Team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":39974,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/54090f43-8812-4628-83e9-3b6edbae3659/Picture7.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/54090f43-8812-4628-83e9-3b6edbae3659/Picture7.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture7.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture7.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"54090f43-8812-4628-83e9-3b6edbae3659\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":209,\"height\":215},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The team of DevOps engineers provides service for the projects in the Portfolio using common approaches and practices, tools, and solutions. With tech-stack unification and heavy reuse, the team builds an Azure-based modern DevOps platform, which is on top of Azure Kubernetes Service and gives a production-ready environment for People Portfolio apps. The team supports application dev teams with their DevOps requests, builds and runs CI/CD, application hosting, and monitoring infrastructure for a dozen of projects.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMPPA/DevOps+Public+KB\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMPPA/DevOps+Public+KB\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DevOps\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owners/Contacts: EPM-PPA\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UXD Team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":138842,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a88a213f-96e0-4619-a709-347e466a6687/Picture8.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a88a213f-96e0-4619-a709-347e466a6687/Picture8.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture8.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture8.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a88a213f-96e0-4619-a709-347e466a6687\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":515,\"height\":207},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The people stream design team connects all designers working on People Portfolio products. One of the main goals of the team is to create a unified user experience across products, provide product integration, move towards creating a product ecosystem and adapt to rapid market changes. To achieve these goals, we need to support product stakeholders, keep track of roadmaps and help create them, keep the project teams and all designers aligned on what is happening both across people products and within the Digital Platform as a whole.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMUXD/EPAM+Design+Platform\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Digital Platform\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owners/Contacts: EPM-UXD\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
